page.title: 04My bungalow
page.content:
I live in a detached bungalow on an estate called Mont es Croix. In my garden l have a fish pond with 30 fish and 15 water snails. I have a swing, a washing line, and a greenhouse where we grow radishes, lettuces, tomatoes and cucumbers. We have a garden shed where l keep my bike and some of the garden tools.
Inside my bungalow there are 8 rooms. I have a bedroom for myself and so has my sister. My Mum and Dad have a double bed and they sleep in that. We have a bathroom with a bath, a sink, a toilet, a radiator and a shower fixed into the bath. We have 10 windows altogether in our bungalow. We have 2 large gardens and 1 small side garden.
